title: Yung Magnificent on Being from Hoover, Signing to Wack100 & More
description:
Yung Magnificent talks about signing to Wack100, label dynamic, politics and more.


-----
00:00 Intro
6:59 - Growing up in the 50s, weighing out d_pe at 7yrs old
14:32 - Going to jail for 4 months, his cousin connecting him with Wack100
17:39 - Only ever crying over 2 artists’ passing: MO3 and Nipsey 
21:15 - Wack is only going to go as hard as the artist goes for theirselves, being more present on social media 
25:37 - Kreep the guap fiend and Young Mackie on being signed to Wack and riding for him after he changed their lives 
29:28 - Things getting heated in the studio recently, having to flash out on a label mate Wack was having issues with 
35:00 - Tru Carr issues with Wack, Wack wanting what he’s owed before letting artist leave 
39:21 - The process of dropping music with Wack and 100Ent, him being a marketing genius, comparing him to Master P and Birdman 
43:33 - Wack never being known for bad business, him being everything he says he is 
46:36 - T-Rell tries to find out what happened with CEO Reek
52:45 - Lil Spook on doing everything, background acting, etc
54:14 - Young Mackey on being put on spot to play fire beats for Jay Rock, passing test, cooking beats from scratch all at 19yrs old 
57:17 - Lil Spook commending the team for what their accomplishing
59:09 - Yung Magnificent on wether he would turn down a feature from a big artist, Lil spook calls out Magnificent for talking over him 
1:08:35 - Yung Magnificent on the state of LA music, not fitting in with typical LA music style 
1:12:21 - I am Yung Magnificent coming soon



-----

Yung Magnificent talks about signing to Wack100, label dynamic, politics and more.



-----

00:00 Intro

6:59 - Growing up in the 50s, weighing out d_pe at 7yrs old

14:32 - Going to jail for 4 months, his cousin connecting him with Wack100

17:39 - Only ever crying over 2 artists’ passing: MO3 and Nipsey 

21:15 - Wack is only going to go as hard as the artist goes for theirselves, being more present on social media 

25:37 - Kreep the guap fiend and Young Mackie on being signed to Wack and riding for him after he changed their lives 

29:28 - Things getting heated in the studio recently, having to flash out on a label mate Wack was having issues with 

35:00 - Tru Carr issues with Wack, Wack wanting what he’s owed before letting artist leave 

39:21 - The process of dropping music with Wack and 100Ent, him being a marketing genius, comparing him to Master P and Birdman 

43:33 - Wack never being known for bad business, him being everything he says he is 

46:36 - T-Rell tries to find out what happened with CEO Reek

52:45 - Lil Spook on doing everything, background acting, etc

54:14 - Young Mackey on being put on spot to play fire beats for Jay Rock, passing test, cooking beats from scratch all at 19yrs old 

57:17 - Lil Spook commending the team for what their accomplishing

59:09 - Yung Magnificent on wether he would turn down a feature from a big artist, Lil spook calls out Magnificent for talking over him 

1:08:35 - Yung Magnificent on the state of LA music, not fitting in with typical LA music style
